content: duality is a hat worked in the round from the bottom up the hat is starts with a 2x2 rib and then continues with a broken rib design available in two sizes duality can be worn as either a slouchy hat or as a beanie *share your duality hat on social media with #dualityhat * follow me on instagram - the first place that i announce new patterns sales knitalongs & giveaways http //bit ly/iknit2purl2-instagram finished dimensions medium - 15 wide circumference unstretched 10 inches long large - 16 wide circumference unstretched 10 5 inches long length can be easily modified needles medium - us size 5 & 7 - 16 circular needles & us size 7 dpns large - us size 6 & 8 - 16 circular needles & us size 8 dpns yarn medium - approx 160 yards worsted weight yarn large - approx 180 yarnds worsted weight yarn shown in malabrigo rios in natural and azul profundo notions stitchmarker tapestry needle add a pom-pom for a different look
